name: Getting Things Done, or The Labyrinth of Doctor Bernstein
name_original: Getting Things Done, or The Labyrinth of Doctor Bernstein
description:
From the pen of Aleks Samoylov, we are proud to finally present Getting Things Done, or the Labyrinth of Doctor Bernstein a premier hypertext journey of exploration, discovery, and intrigue. Can you untangle the mysteries of the twisted labyrinth and survive the onslaught of surreal impressions and existential questions? Only one way find out!

Note: This version of Getting Things Done is a late beta build. It is feature complete, can be played from beginning to end, and includes many paths and several endings, boasting 23,000 words and almost 200 passages. There are currently no known major (or minor, for that matter) bugs, but if you do find one, please feel free to let the author know so that it might be fixed asap. The final version of this premier hypertext adventure experience will not differ markedly from this one, save for a few extra bits of optional side content and one or two more proofreading passes.

Purchase of this exciting product is an excellent way to support Aleks Samoylov as an artist, writer, game developer, and all around creative sort of person. If you're hankering to support them in the long term, you can also become a patron at patreon.com/feedthealeks.
